3: The airship and transport escorting Liv are disappearing into the sky...
Beneath the fiery red clouds, a girl is walking alone in the wilderness, enveloped by a giant black shadow.
The high concentration of the Punishing Virus in this area has deterred even the best-equipped Constructs, but it doesn't affect the girl at all.
It took a lot of effort for me to become what I am now. I really want everybody to see this...
But I have more important things to do right now.
Mecha babushka, give me the coordinates.
What you do will not change this catastrophe.
I'll do it even if it's in vain. I don't want humanity and all those beautiful creations to perish.
The girl doesn't look so carefree as she usually does. Instead, she's firm and serious.
I'll help them realize their wishes, and in exchange, they'll help me too.
She feels a pang of nostalgia as she looks up to the sky and waves goodbye to her 'home' beyond the clouds.
